args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . Dept. of Homeland Security wants IRS to help with immigration enforcement Homeland Security Secretary Kristi L. Noem has requested that the Treasury Department provide IRS personnel to assist with immigration enforcement, the Trump administration’s latest effort to expand federal resources to fulfill his campaign pledge to deport more undocumented immigrants. In a Friday memo to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, Noem cited several areas in which U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement needs additional help. Read the full story
